item.title: CRM Portal Interface
item.description: Electrum Payments connects businesses together to transact with each other easily and robustly. This CRM Portal Interface describes a simple interface against which calls can be made to retrieve information from a backend CRM system. The intended use cases include the lookup of customer-linked account or purchase history data from a bank or retailer’s CRM environment. It is not intended that the CRM system is hosted by Electrum, but rather that this interface abstracts the logic required to execute a set of predefined CRM queries, hence simplifying communication.
